trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_SEQ_00<tab>The Lominsan delegate would entreat your aid in dealing with a grave threat back home.

TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_SEQ_01<tab>A blasphemy, one of the fell beasts that portend the Final Days, has been sighted off the coast of Vylbrand. Admiral Bloefhiswyn has already begun to take action to deal with the threat, and she would have you join in the effort. At the official's behest, you agree to travel to Limsa and lend what aid you can.

TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_SEQ_02<tab>The situation in Limsa Lominsa is not entirely grim, for the secretariat at Maelstrom Command informs you that an increasing number of Sahagin have been freed from primal enthrallment and now seek peaceful relations with their neighbors. It is these newfound allies whose help Merlwyb would enlist in further assessing the situation, and she requests you accompany her to a meeting at South Tidegate.

TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_SEQ_03<tab>You rendezvous with Merlwyb at South Tidegate, but─troublingly─your Sahagin allies are nowhere to be found. Fearing for their safety, Merlwyb makes for nearby Halfstone in search of them.

TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_SEQ_04<tab>You and Merlwyb arrive in Halfstone to see that your fears were indeed warranted. Grotesque beasts are poised to slaughter the Sahagin you came to meet. At Merlwyb's behest, you race to save the one named Noll from a grim fate.

TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_SEQ_05<tab>You make short work of the beast mere moments before it strikes down the defenseless Noll. Breathing a sigh of relief, you turn to the Sahagin youth to ensure he is indeed unharmed.

TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_SEQ_06<tab>Noll, who is shaken but otherwise no worse for the wear, thanks you profoundly for saving his life. Helping him to his feet, you set off to rejoin Merlwyb, who is fighting her own battle a short distance away.

TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_SEQ_07<tab>Safe from danger for the moment, you return with Merlwyb and the Sahagin pair to South Tidegate. It is there that Noll confirms that the selfsame horror you witnessed at Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han has come to Vylbrand, and that the beasts you dispatched were once his very own spawnbrothers. Noll further explains that these latest victims were affiliated with the Crushing Tide─a Sahagin faction that rejects efforts to make peace with Limsa. With a fuller understanding of the dangers his people face, Noll returns home, while you and Merlwyb agree to meet back at Maelstrom Command to discuss your next course of action.

TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_SEQ_08<tab>Back at Maelstrom Command, Merlwyb resolves to put the knowledge she has gleaned from you and Noll to full use in bringing a swift end to the blasphemy. Vowing to do your part, you take your leave until your next course of action is decided upon.
※The next role quest will be available from the Maelstrom secretariat upon reaching level 86 in any melee DPS class.
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the secretariat at Maelstrom Command.
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Merlwyb at South Tidegate.
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Merlwyb again.
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_TODO_03<tab>Defeat the fell beast.
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_TODO_04<tab>Rescue Noll of the Calming Seas.
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_TODO_05<tab>Speak with Merlwyb.
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_TODO_06<tab>Speak with Merlwyb at Maelstrom Command.

TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_LIMSARESIDENTOFFICIAL_000_010<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. On behalf of Admiral Bloefhiswyn, I thank you for your many deeds in service to Limsa Lominsa.

TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_LIMSARESIDENTOFFICIAL_000_011<tab>We have received troubling tidings that beasts akin to those that plague Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han have been sighted on the La Noscean coast.

TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_LIMSARESIDENTOFFICIAL_000_012<tab>On behalf of my people, I thank you for your efforts in delivering this star from catastrophe. Unfortunately, we have received troubling tidings that beasts akin to those that plagued Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han have been sighted on the La Noscean coast.

TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_LIMSARESIDENTOFFICIAL_000_013<tab>The Admiral has mustered the Maelstrom in hopes of quelling the threat. Yet there is much we do not understand about our foe, and as such, your expertise in this arena would be a great boon to us. Will you help us?
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_A1_000_001<tab>I will do all that I can.
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_A1_000_002<tab>Wouldn't be much of a hero if I refused, would I?
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_LIMSARESIDENTOFFICIAL_000_015<tab>Excellent. The Admiral will be heartened to have your knowledge and martial prowess on our side, I am certain.
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_LIMSARESIDENTOFFICIAL_000_016<tab>Pray set sail for Limsa as soon as you are able. The secretariat at Maelstrom Command will apprise you of the details upon your arrival.
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_LIMSASECRETARY_000_050<tab>Ah, our man in Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han told us to expect you. I'll inform the Admiral of your arrival.
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_MERLWYB_000_051<tab>Glad you could join us, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_MERLWYB_000_052<tab>I only wish it were under better circumstances.
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_MERLWYB_000_053<tab>The grave news from the Bounty has not escaped our ears. I can scarce begin to imagine the horrors you have witnessed there.
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_MERLWYB_000_054<tab>It pains me to say the selfsame hell has come to Vylbrand. Fell beasts born of deepest despair have been sighted all throughout our island.
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_MERLWYB_000_055<tab>Although you and the Scions have averted the Final Days, blasphemies continue to appear in certain regions, Vylbrand among them.
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_MERLWYB_000_056<tab>Tell <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> what we know.
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_LIMSASECRETARY_000_057<tab>The first report came a few days ago, from one of our men patrolling Skull Valley.

TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_LIMSASECRETARY_000_058<tab>He spoke of a fearsome creature unlike any native to our shores. While we had our suspicions, it was only later that a connection to the Final Days was confirmed by a most unlikely source─the Sahagin.
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_LIMSASECRETARY_000_059<tab>We've been treating their tempered for some time now, and many have made a full recovery.
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_LIMSASECRETARY_000_060<tab>Owing to this, some factions are eager to improve diplomatic relations with Limsa.
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_MERLWYB_000_061<tab>It is one such faction that has provided the most comprehensive reports, in all their alarming detail.

TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_LIMSASECRETARY_000_062<tab>They speak of a most dreadful sight─their spawnbrothers transforming into horrific beasts before their very eyes. Indeed, it is far too similar to the incidents in Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han to be mere coincidence.
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_MERLWYB_000_063<tab>If our assumptions are correct, the first and most formidable of the beasts─a “blasphemy,” as it was decided we would call them─prowls our waters as we speak.
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_MERLWYB_000_064<tab>We may have been spared the Final Days, but so long as this abomination remains to harry us, we cannot truly say the storm has passed.

TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_LIMSASECRETARY_000_065<tab>Fortunately, there've been no sightings of the blasphemy within the city. Nevertheless, if we are to spare our people the horror that befell Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han, the fiend must be dealt with─and quickly.
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_LIMSASECRETARY_000_066<tab>Despite our investigative efforts, we remain very much in the dark as to the precise nature of the threat we face.

TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_LIMSASECRETARY_000_067<tab>Were we to recklessly dispatch large numbers of troops, we'd run the risk of having our own men corrupted. You can well imagine the carnage that would ensue.
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_LIMSASECRETARY_000_068<tab>As such, Admiral Bloefhiswyn has decided to keep those involved to a minimum, and lead the investigation herself.
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_MERLWYB_000_069<tab>And I would have you at my side. What say you?
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_MERLWYB_000_070<tab>You have my thanks. We will depart at once to meet with our Sahagin allies and gather what knowledge we can, that we might devise a proper plan of attack.
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_MERLWYB_000_071<tab>They are due to arrive at South Tidegate soon. I'll go on ahead and wait for you there.

TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_LIMSARESIDENTOFFICIAL_000_075<tab>On behalf of Limsa, I thank you for agreeing to assist us in these trying times. The secretariat at Maelstrom Command will apprise you of the situation at hand upon your arrival.
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_MERLWYB_000_100<tab>It's well past our agreed-upon meeting time, but the Sahagin are nowhere to be seen.
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_MERLWYB_000_101<tab>They did not seem the sorts to break their word. This bodes ill...
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_MERLWYB_000_102<tab>Let us leave this place to the guards, and search Halfstone for any sign of them.
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_LIMSASECRETARY_000_105<tab>The Admiral has arranged for a meeting to take place with our Sahagin collaborators at South Tidegate. Pray join her there as soon as you are able.
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_MERLWYB_000_150<tab>Noll is in danger! Quickly, to his aid!
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_FRIENDLYSAHAGIN04114_000_155<tab>Pshhh...! Wh-What is this thing!?
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_MERLWYB_000_200<tab>What are you waiting for!? Go!
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_FRIENDLYSAHAGIN04114_000_205<tab>Pshhh...! Wh-What is this thing!?
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_NOLL_000_210<tab>Pshhh! I cannot die here!
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_NOLL_000_250<tab>Pshhh... Many thanksss, shhhorewalker.
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_NOLL_000_251<tab>P-Pray tell...is my companion sssafe?
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_NOLL_000_252<tab>Pshhh! The Admiral herssself comes to our aid? Glad tidings indeed.
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_NOLL_000_253<tab>You, too, have my boundless gratitude for sssaving my life. Let us quit this place before those beasts return.
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_MERLWYB_000_255<tab>Noll is just beyond. Get him to safety!
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_FRIENDLYSAHAGIN04114_000_260<tab>Pshhh! Where is Noll!?
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_MERLWYB_000_300<tab>Everyone's still alive. Good.
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_MERLWYB_000_301<tab>But not if we stay out here too long. Inside, quickly.
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_NOLL_000_302<tab>Pshhh... Thank you, my friendsss. Those ghastly beasts would have made shhhort work of us had you not intervened.

TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_NOLL_000_303<tab>...And yet, it brought me no joy to watch them die. For─unbelievable as it may sound─until a shhhort time ago, they were none other than our very own ssspawnbrothers. At first, we thought them merely cursssed, but our talismans and magicks availed us not...
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_MERLWYB_000_304<tab>Aye, 'twas no curse. 'Twas an evil like no other─innocent souls transformed against their will into unholy beasts called blasphemies.
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_NOLL_000_305<tab>“Blasssphemies”...? Pray tell us more.
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_MERLWYB_000_306<tab>That would be your area of expertise, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_NOLL_000_307<tab>Pshhh... Turned into beasts by the power of dessspair? This is horrifying, indeed...
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_MERLWYB_000_308<tab>Hmm... Thus far, the phenomenon here in La Noscea has been limited to the Sahagin. Why is that?
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_NOLL_000_309<tab>Pshhh... I cannot sssay. Yet I wonder if the Crushhhing Tide are involved in some way.
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_MERLWYB_000_310<tab>I know naught of this Crushing Tide...
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_NOLL_000_311<tab>Word of them has yet to reach you, I sssee.
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_NOLL_000_312<tab>It all began when the Indigo Matriarch─the queen of our kind─was ssstricken with a grave malady.

TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_NOLL_000_313<tab>Tragic as this was, there was one small sssolace. She was not fond of shhhorewalkers, and so deprived of her leadership, more of my kind came to see the wisdom in making peace with Limsa Lominsa.

TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_NOLL_000_314<tab>There remain, of course, those who would oppose our cause. They formed a group they call the Crushhhing Tide. Even now, they seek to summon the Lord of the Whorl anew, and consign all finless ones unto the briny deep.
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_NOLL_000_315<tab>However, they lack the crystals necessary to do so. Denied the power they crave, they can do naught but gnashhh their teeth in desperation.
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_MERLWYB_000_316<tab>And you suspect these feelings of helplessness are the cause of their transformations?
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_NOLL_000_317<tab>Jussst so. Those of our ssspawnbrothers who turned into those beastsss had been fraternizing with the Crushing Tide.
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_NOLL_000_318<tab>Dessspite our differences, we cannot abandon our kin to sssuch a cruel fate.

TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_NOLL_000_319<tab>Yet we must be careful not to drive them to still deeper dessspair. Yes...we must consider the sssituation carefully, lest we bring dessstruction upon all our kind...
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_MERLWYB_000_320<tab>Tell me this─are the Crushing Tide even now under Leviathan's thrall? If freed from their drowned state, might they not listen to reason?
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_NOLL_000_321<tab>Were it only so sssimple... All but a few are long since cured. They walk this path of their own free will.
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_MERLWYB_000_322<tab>In that case, they may yet be dissuaded from their present course.
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_MERLWYB_000_323<tab>For the sake of our nascent alliance, we will do all we can to save your brethren.
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_MERLWYB_000_324<tab>Fortunately, a most capable ally stands with us. For this <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> has bested many a formidable foe, including Leviathan.
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_NOLL_000_325<tab>Pshhh! The great <var 29 EB02 /var>, in the fleshhh? Honored am I to stand in your presence!
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_MERLWYB_000_326<tab>Together, we will weather this storm, and usher in a new age of harmony. This I swear.

TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_MERLWYB_000_327<tab>There is much to be done. For now, let us return to our homes and prepare as best we can for the trials ahead. Should we discover aught of value, we'll be sure to share it with you. I ask that you do the same.
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_NOLL_000_328<tab>Pshhh... Indeed we shhhall. Until sssuch time, I watch over my ssspawnbrothers and pray that no more sssuccumb to the change.
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_NOLL_000_330<tab>Pshhh...! Relieved I am to see the both of you sssafe!
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_FRIENDLYSAHAGIN04114_000_335<tab>Pshhh... Had the Admiral not come to our ressscue when she did, I shhhudder to think of what would have happened!
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_MERLWYB_000_350<tab>Welcome back. Thanks to you and Noll, I now possess a proper understanding of the challenge we face.
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_MERLWYB_000_351<tab>'Tis a daunting task that lies before us. We'll continue to cooperate with the Sahagin to learn all we can.
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_MERLWYB_000_352<tab>Once we have located the blasphemy, I will have need of your strength.
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_MERLWYB_000_353<tab>Till then, I ask that you remain at the ready. Clearly, the storm clouds have only begun to gather...
TEXT_AKTKBA301_04114_LIMSASECRETARY_000_355<tab>The Admiral told me everything. Thank the Navigator that you were there to dispatch those terrible beasts.
